item.title: About
item.description: A brand new site. Not much going on yet, but essentially you should find supplementary materials such as model speaking responses for the speaking textbooks currently used at English House.

item.title: Lesson 2 - Elaboration Techniques
item.description: Daily routine Please describe your typical daily routine. My daily routine is pretty standard. I usually wake up early, get dressed, eat breakfast, and then head off to school. In the evenings, I’ll usually do some studying or hang out with friends. But sometimes I feel like I’m stuck in a rut with the same old routine, and it can get pretty tedious. Do you like to plan what you will do each day?

item.title: Surprise Surprise
item.description: Thank you for your support! Hello. If you like this template, I’d be happy to get a coffee donation :)
